    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

      • difficultySelection

        public static int difficultySelection()
        Method prompting user to enter integer for lives in current hangman game. If custom number is desired, private method customDifficulty is called allowing custom input by user.
        Returns:
        int representing attempts user will have in current hangman game.

      • getWordIndex

        public static int getWordIndex​(int totalWords)
        A method returning a unique index in the range of word array. This index is to be used to extract a word from loaded word array to be used in a game of hagman. Once an index has been selected, that index in a boolean array wordUsed is set to true to indicate the word has been used and should not be used again.
        Parameters:
        totalWords - an int for total words that have been loaded into the game of hangman.
        See Also:
        Before an index is selected, the total games played is compared to the total words loaded into the hangman program (totalWords). If the games played is divisble by the total words, a private method clearWords() is called to reset all elements of wordUsed[] to false.

      • buildHiddenString

        public static java.lang.StringBuilder buildHiddenString​(java.lang.String word)
        A method that creates hidden version of randomly chosen word. Hidden word is displayed to user. As user inputs letters in the word, those letters will be revealed.
        Parameters:
        word - the String object for the word user will guess in current hangman game.
        Returns:
        StringBuilder object which is same length as word but hides letter and can be transformed by user input.

      • getLetter

        public static java.lang.String getLetter​(java.lang.StringBuilder hiddenWord,
                                         int lives,
                                         java.lang.String lettersUsed)
        This method is the framework for getting a valid letter input from user. Method inputChar() is called to get user input, and then that input is checked for validity. Consists of additional private methods isLetter() and isUnique() as control for letter input. An inavlid input will prompt a response and the current state of the game UI will be printed again.
        Parameters:
        hiddenWord - passed in as a parameter to be printed out in case of invalid input.
        lives - passed in as a parameter to be printed out in case of invalid input.
        lettersUsed - used in isUnique() control method and is also printed in case of invalid input.
        Returns:
        String representing a unqiue and valid input by user.

      • printUI

        public static void printUI​(java.lang.StringBuilder hiddenWord,
                           int lives,
                           java.lang.String lettersUsed)
        Method to print out information about current game including the hidden word, lives remaining, and the letters used so far.
        Parameters:
        hiddenWord - is printed to standard output.
        lives - is printed to standard output.
        lettersUsed - is printed to standard output.
